name: licons
description: A group of icons made from HTML & CSS that can transition between each other

scripts.start: npm run build && http-server examples -o -c-1 & npm run watch-js & npm run watch-less
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p examples/static/build/js && browserify -t babelify examples/static/src/js/index.js -o examples/static/build/js/index.js
scripts.build-less: mkdir -p examples/static/build/css && lessc examples/static/src/less/index.less > examples/static/build/css/index.css && echo 'Less compiled'
scripts.watch-less: watch 'npm run build-less' examples/static/src/less/ & watch 'npm run build-less' src/less/
scripts.build: ulimit -n 512 && npm install && npm run build-less && npm run build-js
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run watch-js & npm run watch-less
scripts.dist: npm run build && mkdir -p dist/static/build && npm run dist-static && cp -r examples/index.html dist/

author: Jake 'Sid' Smith
